availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Paton (Clerk of Bourbon Circuit Court)

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, circuit court clerk. Virginia native. Married to Elizabeth Paton. Father of James C. Paton, Ben G. Paton, Edward Paton, Joseph Paton, Alice Paton, and Fannie Paton. Clerk of the Bourbon Circuit Court in Bourbon County from 1860 to 1870.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon, District 1, p. 40. Find A Grave, “James Patton (April 3, 1801-1890),” Memorial 153832160, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=Patton&GSfn=James&GSbyrel=all&GSdyrel=all&GSst=19&GScnty=997&GScntry=4&GSob=n&GRid=153832160&df=all& (accessed June 5, 2017).
